game.name: Fated Souls 3
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Get the final episode in the Fated Souls series! Cut bushes, jump, kick, push stones, solve logic puzzles and more!
